attributes.action: Make London underground and TFL free of charge in London during Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: We need to support financially the workers who still need to commute to get to work. It doesn’t feel right to charge them a ticket because they don’t have the luxury of working from home.
attributes.background: Please make all transport for London free of charge during this Coronavirus epidemic in London

rejection.details:
Responsibility for TfL is devolved to the Mayor of London and not the Government or Parliament.

You might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305801
